headings.usage: All section titles, hero headings, and major callouts. Use tracking-tight for sizes above 32px.

body.usage: Paragraphs, navigation, buttons, and UI elements. Use relaxed line-height for readability.

accents.usage: Small labels, tags, and data points (e.g., 'EST. 2024', 'WARSAW').

primary.name: Navy Blue
primary.usage: Primary buttons, footer background, strong text headings.

secondary.name: Wealth Gold
secondary.usage: Accent lines, primary button hover states, icons, key highlights.

layout.grid_system: Use 'Bento' grids for services. Asymmetric 'Tetris' grid for Hero section.
layout.spacing: Use generous padding (py-20, py-32) between sections. Internal card padding should be p-8 or p-10.

buttons.primary: bg-[#0A192F] text-white hover:bg-[#D4AF37] hover:text-[#0A192F] transition-all duration-300 rounded-sm px-8 py-4 font-medium tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: border border-[#0A192F] text-[#0A192F] hover:bg-[#0A192F] hover:text-white transition-all duration-300 rounded-sm px-8 py-4

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1

forms.input: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-[#0A192F] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#0A192F] rounded-sm h-12
forms.label: text-sm font-medium text-slate-700 mb-2 block

hero_bg.description: Warsaw skyline, blending modern and historic. Use with heavy overlay for text readability.

about_meeting.description: Professional meeting context for 'About Me' or 'Services' section.

wealth_abstract.description: Abstract gold spheres for 'Investment Philosophy' or background texture.

premium_texture.description: Black and gold lines for footer background or high-contrast sections.

motion.entrance: Use 'framer-motion' for staggered entrance of grid items. Fade up + scale in slightly.
motion.hover: Subtle lift (-4px) and shadow increase for cards. Buttons fill with color.
motion.scroll: Parallax effect on the Hero background image.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
